text: @piersmorgan I've seen n heard of people dying from heart attacks and other long term health conditions but, if they test positive for Covid-19 (or if they showed any single symptom recently) it's being marked up as 'Coronavirus linked'. I just struggle to believe the figures are accurate (1)
